content.text: Role: Design Lead, Project Manager\Tools: Sketch

In the ever-evolving landscape of cloud-based infrastructure, untracked resources can lead to unexpected budget overruns. Recognizing the critical need for proactive solutions, We seized the opportunity to leverage data analytics in aiding businesses to identify potential rogue resources before they could adversely impact their budgets.

I spearheaded a collaborative initiative, leading a team of skilled designers and developers to craft a cutting-edge application. This transformative tool empowered both DevOps teams and executive stakeholders, offering unparalleled insights into their cloud environments. By facilitating informed adjustments, we successfully safeguarded budgets, ensuring financial objectives remained on track.

To set the stage for this impactful project, I initiated a comprehensive Design Thinking workshop. This inclusive session brought together a diverse group of stakeholders, fostering a shared understanding and laying the foundation for a user-centric approach. I am now eager to bring this wealth of experience to a growing design team or contribute to a dynamic sales enablement team, where my leadership in fostering collaboration and delivering user-focused solutions can drive success.

media.caption: A high-level journey map to identify potential opportunities for an enhanced user experience.
Partial output from a clustering exercise I facilitated during the Design Thinking workshop.
A high-level sketching exercise to emphasize the required data visualizations.

High level sketching exercise to focus on the required data visualizations.

content.text: Navigating the alignment of the executive team with the intricacies of the design process presented a notable challenge. Through strategic measures, I successfully addressed this obstacle by maintaining open channels of constant communication and actively involving them in every phase of the design process. This approach not only ensured their continuous support but also fostered a collaborative environment where executive insights seamlessly integrated with the design journey.

Through the implementation of the application, businesses experienced a remarkable 25-40% reduction in budget overruns. This impactful outcome not only demonstrated the tangible success of our user-centric design approach but also contributed to the recognition and acquisition of our product.

The pivotal takeaway from initiating the Design Thinking workshop to kick off the project was the essential presence of all stakeholders in one collaborative space. This inclusive approach ensured that every voice was heard and every participant felt genuinely invested in the design process.
Tools: Python, React, Node.js, MySQL, Bulma, AWS, Google Sheets, Framer Motion, Figma\Role: Frontend Developer, Backend Developer, Data Analyst

Fueled by a passion for sports, I embarked on an exploration of the intriguing relationship between in-game statistics and their impact on betting lines. The goal was to develop a model capable of surpassing a 50% accuracy rate, presenting an opportunity to outperform traditional bookmaking strategies and potentially 'beat the bookie.'

This venture not only underscored my commitment to innovative problem-solving but also showcased my ability to blend domain interest with data-driven insights.

I designed and developed of a sophisticated automated system geared towards efficient data collection, analysis, and model training. Recognizing the limitations of manual data capture, I initially began with a script to streamline the process, realizing its scalability across multiple sports. This pivotal step marked the transition from labor-intensive manual efforts to a systematic and time-efficient solution.

With data seamlessly captured, my focus shifted to comprehensive data analysis and model training for pre-game and in-game predictions. To eliminate the need for manual intervention, I meticulously crafted scripts to automate the entire workflow. The system initiates data collection each morning, providing real-time predictions during games, and concludes with the automatic training of new models based on the latest data.

In addition to optimizing the backend operations, I designed an intuitive user interface (UI) to enhance the user experience. This UI allows users to swiftly access and visualize predictions, eliminating the need for cumbersome spreadsheet analysis. I am eager to bring this blend of technical innovation and user-centric design to a growing design team or contribute to a sales enablement team, where my skills can contribute to impactful, streamlined solutions.

media.caption: A screenshot representing the initial manual predictions.
A screenshot representing the scale of the manual data that was input by hand.
A screenshot representing the initial data analysis.
Video capture of Python scripts collecting data in real-time.
React UI built to display predictions for each game in a user friendly manner.
A React UI displaying live games and indicating whether the predictions are accurate or not. (Colors have not been tested for accessibility.)
React UI showing a low fidelity dashboard of the results of the predictions.

content.text: Embarking on this endeavor, I initially underestimated its scope. What began as a manual input of data into a spreadsheet quickly evolved into a deep dive into deploying a Flask server on AWS. This journey showcased my adaptability and problem-solving skills as I navigated the transition from manual data entry to implementing a robust and scalable server solution.

I am pleased to share that the meticulously trained models I developed have consistently surpassed the targeted accuracy threshold of 50%. This achievement not only validates the effectiveness of the design and implementation process but also underscores my commitment to delivering impactful outcomes.
Tools: ReactJS, Storybook\Role: Design Technologist, Developer
My team migrated to focusing on the development of reusable components for Carbon, the IBM design system. I had the opportunity to expand my knowledge of design system development.

I developed and contributed reusable components to the design system. Additionally, I designed and developed a component playground that enables designers to see how the components interact with each other.

media.caption: Storybook implementation or the 'User Profile Image' component. Image variation shown.
Storybook implementation or the 'User Profile Image' component. Icon variation shown.
Storybook implementation or the 'User Profile Image' component. Initials variation shown.

Storybook implementation or the 'Button' component.
Component playgound landing page.
Component playgound edit page.
Component playgound wizard page.

content.text: I was not well-versed in DevOps. This endeavor allowed me to gain a better understanding of DevOps, forcing me into the uncomfortable position of not knowing and having to learn and figure it out. I am now more comfortable in the DevOps space due to this experience.
My contributions help expand the library, expediting development across the organization by enabling developers to easily plug in components, rather than wasting time writing new code.
Working closely with the design team was crucial to our success. It allowed us to inform designers about what was possible and what had already been developed, minimizing waste.
Tools: NodeJS, ReactJS, Bash Scripting\Role: UX Design, Frontend Developer and Backend Developer

Engaging in a conversation with a photographer working on a project involving product shoots for a website, I recognized a unique opportunity to enhance his workflow. Inspired by the goal to streamline the process, I envisioned a solution where he could capture product images and instantly visualize them within a web layout. This innovative approach not only aimed to expedite the photographer's workflow but also reflected my dedication to crafting user-centric solutions.

I conceptualized and brought to life a versatile product website skin, meticulously crafted to facilitate seamless navigation across multiple pages. Elevating this solution, I also designed and developed an OS utility tailored for photographers engaged in tethered shooting. This innovative utility automatically resized and showcased images in real-time within the website's skin as products were being photographed.

Empowering the photographer with the ability to interactively explore how the images appeared on various screens and sizes, this integrated system significantly enhanced the workflow.

media.caption: The photographer's tethered studio setup allows him to view images on a website at a glance.
The photographer's tethered studio setup allows him to view images on a website at a glance.
Themed page showing the product page populated with photos.
Themed page showing the details of the product.
Themed page showing the details of the product.
Simulation of a photograph entering the computer with the responsive website updating automatically.

content.text: Undertaking this project compelled me to delve into the intricacies of bash scripting and file systems, challenging me to acquire a comprehensive understanding of coding within this context. The experience not only broadened my technical skill set but also showcased my adaptability and commitment to mastering new domains.

The photographer made adjustments in real-time based on how the images looked on the web. An added benefit was he showed the client the photos on the web, impressing the client and leading to more work.

Upon deployment, I observed an opportunity to enhance the user experience—seemingly duplicate images were appearing in the template. Recognizing the need for refinement, I envisioned a solution that would empower photographers to tag images.

This feature, when implemented, would selectively showcase only the tagged images, providing a more accurate representation of how the entire website would look. This insight emphasizes my commitment to continuous improvement and user-centric design.
Tools: Python, ReactJS, Carbon \Role: UX Designer, Frontend Developer and Backend Developer

Recognizing the growing demand for AI integration within our products, I saw an opportunity to strategically incorporate AI into our prototypes. My vision was to leverage these prototypes as persuasive tools to encourage executives to allocate resources for expanding AI integration across our entire product range. Despite the steep learning curve, I proactively navigated the challenge, acknowledging that none of the developers on the team were well-versed in AI/ML.

This initiative exemplifies my commitment to staying ahead of industry trends and my ability to strategically influence and guide teams through technological advancements.

Leveraging my expertise with a certification in AI/ML, I crafted a user-friendly utility aimed at empowering developers unfamiliar with model training. This innovative tool facilitated the seamless integration of predictive models into prototypes. Collaborating closely with product owners, developers could identify the essential features for predictions. With a straightforward process, they uploaded structured data to the tool and received a file, transforming into an API endpoint that seamlessly provided predictions within their prototypes.

This solution not only streamlined the integration of predictive models but also ensured that the generated predictive data offered a more realistic and meaningful representation compared to conventional dummy data.

media.caption: UI screen that a developer would use to upload the structured data and highlight the features and the field to be predicted.
UI of the model API returning predictive data used in a mock prototype. The 'Class' column serves as the prediction column.

content.text:
Originally conceived to assist developers in seamlessly integrating predictive models into prototypes, the impact of the demo extended far beyond its initial scope. The showcased demo not only fulfilled its primary objective but also sparked a wave of innovative ideas with the potential to significantly contribute to the growth of the organization.

This experience highlights my ability to envision solutions that transcend immediate challenges, fostering an environment of continuous innovation.

Beyond my day-to-day responsibilities, I bring additional skills to the table that hold untapped potential for simplifying the lives of my colleagues. Recognizing the broader utility of my skill set, I am eager to explore opportunities where these complementary abilities can contribute to the efficiency and success of the team.
Tools: ReactJS, Lottie\Role: Frontend Developer

Within IBM's expansive design organization, multiple pattern libraries existed, each serving distinct purposes. Recognizing the potential for enhanced accessibility, I spearheaded an initiative to consolidate all these libraries under a unified umbrella, providing users with streamlined access through a single website. Moreover, I championed the introduction of a visualization feature, offering a comprehensive view of all patterns and their usage across the entire organization.

Despite limited familiarity with animated SVGs, I embraced the challenge and assumed a leadership role in driving the initiative to completion within a tight timeline. This experience showcases my proactive approach to addressing complex challenges and my ability to lead initiatives that contribute to the coherence and efficiency of design ecosystems. I am eager to bring this strategic vision and hands-on leadership to a growing design team or contribute to a sales enablement team, where my skills can foster collaborative design solutions and drive organizational success.

I successfully crafted a dynamic animated SVG that not only visually showcased a breakdown of patterns but also provided additional information upon hovering. This enhancement not only improved the user experience by offering a more engaging and informative interface but also contributed to the overall success of the initiative to consolidate pattern libraries at IBM.

media.caption: Animated SVG running on the internal website.

content.text:
Navigating a tight timeline amidst evolving requirements, I successfully addressed challenges through transparent communication and honest discussions about feasible deliverables within the given constraints. By fostering an environment of open dialogue, I managed to deliver an MVP version promptly and systematically incorporated enhancements on a weekly basis until the final update was achieved.

This adaptive and collaborative approach showcases my commitment to delivering high-quality solutions in dynamic circumstances.

I designed a solution that empowers developers and designers to efficiently track the usage of patterns across the organization. By structuring the SVG to dynamically read from a data file, I ensured seamless synchronization with the executive summary file. This strategic approach not only enhanced the visibility of pattern utilization but also minimized the need for ongoing maintenance.

I am excited to bring this level of efficiency and foresight to a growing design team or contribute to a sales enablement team, where streamlining processes and maintaining clear insights into design ecosystems are crucial for success.

Effective and transparent communication is instrumental in securing the necessary time to successfully complete tasks. This understanding, coupled with my commitment to fostering open and honest dialogue, has proven invaluable in ensuring that projects are given the attention and duration required for optimal outcomes.
Tools: VueJS\Role: Frontend Developer

At the time, Watson Assistant lacked a pre-built user interface, requiring customers to allocate resources for deploying a UI instead of concentrating on training models. Recognizing the need to streamline this process, the team took the initiative to develop a user-friendly interface that seamlessly integrated with Watson Assistant.

I engineered a prototype that seamlessly integrated a generic user interface with Watson Assistant, showcasing a novel chat window interface. This strategic solution aimed to empower customers to concentrate on model training, relieving them of the intricacies of developing a user interface.

By providing a tangible example, this prototype demonstrated the potential for a more streamlined and user-centric approach to utilizing Watson Assistant.

media.caption: Simulation of a user interacting with the coded prototype of Watson Assistant.

content.text: Skills: Customer service, contract negotiations, sales, accounting, finance, logistics, social media, human resources\Role: Co-founder, Photographer, IT Architect

As young professionals seeking vibrant nightlife options, my friend and I noticed a distinct gap in the market for engaging entertainment. Having recently moved from the DC area, where options were plentiful, we identified an opportunity to address this gap and enhance the nightlife scene.

I co-founded a thriving event planning company that catered to the vibrant social scene of young professionals in the area. Our success prompted expansion into other metro areas in North Carolina, garnering a following that surged from a handful of friends to over 25,000 individuals throughout the Mid-Atlantic region. Our events became the go-to gatherings, known for their must-attend appeal.

In my role, I spearheaded the development of a robust marketing system designed to capture client information and disseminate targeted emails about upcoming events. Working in close collaboration with venues and vendors, I played a pivotal role in budgeting and contract negotiations.

Additionally, I managed a dynamic team encompassing security, DJs, hostesses, and marketing personnel.

media.caption: We hosted events to raise funds for charities, such as the Pink Party for breast cancer awareness.
We built relationships with corporate sponsors to enhance the experience for our customers.
Our network allowed us to work with celebrities to separate our events from others. We even had celebrities attend our events. (Lance Gross pictured)
A big part of a successful event was atmosphere. We took great care in decorating spaces according to the event.
Hard work paying off as customers come out and enjoy themselves while creating memories for life.
Our events brought people of various walks of life together under one roof to have wonderful evenings.

content.text:
Though inexperienced in event planning, my friend and I undertook the challenge of not only attending but organizing events to fill the nightlife gap we identified. The primary obstacle was securing suitable venues, and I honed my negotiation skills to articulate the mutual benefits for both parties.

Recognizing the importance of financial management, I navigated the accounting and finance aspects diligently to ensure the sustainability of our venture. Striking a balance, I maintained budgets for events while achieving profitability for over 95% of them. To streamline logistics, we introduced a will-call protocol, simplifying the attendee experience and ensuring our events ran seamlessly.

This experience reflects my adaptability, financial acumen, and problem-solving skills. I am enthusiastic about bringing these attributes to a growing design team or contributing to a sales enablement team, where strategic planning and operational efficiency are crucial for success.

What began as an endeavor with the anticipation of support from close friends and their networks surpassed our expectations in terms of success. Our annual profits consistently soared by approximately 50%, and our customer base expanded to an impressive 25,000 individuals. The paradigm shifted as venues actively sought our collaboration to host events on their premises. Remarkably, our impact extended beyond events, as we played a role in fostering connections that led to several marriages.

This journey showcases my ability to not only identify opportunities but to also leverage them for sustained growth and positive community impact.

Embracing the philosophy of 'if you build it, they will come,' our venture exemplified the transformative power of creation. In constructing something from nothing, we witnessed a remarkable influx of people who resonated with our vision. The essence of this experience is a testament to the adage- just do it. It underscores the idea that taking bold steps, even if the outcome is uncertain, can lead to unforeseen successes.

This perspective reflects my proactive and fearless approach to design challenges. I am enthusiastic about contributing this mindset to a growing design team or a sales enablement team, where the courage to innovate and the drive to overcome challenges are instrumental in achieving collective success.
